def_cn: 不均衡的；一边倒的；悬殊的
def_en: If you say that an activity or relationship is one-sided, you think that one of the people or groups involved does much more than the other or is much stronger than the other.

def_cn: 片面的；偏颇的；不公正的
def_en: If you describe someone as one-sided, you are critical of what they say or do because you think it shows that they have considered only one side of an issue or event.
